page.title: 04PUBLIC SERVICES-SPETCHLEY
page.content: { {HEALTH}-There are no doctors' or dentists' surgeries in the area, so local people travel to Worcester or Pershore health centres. {EDUCATION}-There are now no schools in the area. Children therefore travel to Drakes Broughton to first schools, to Pinvin to attend Middle School and then to Pershore High School, a Comprehensive. Many families in the area send their children to independent schools in Worcester City. {COMMUNICATIONS}-Spetchley has retained its own tiny telephone exchange within the Worcester area. Its code is 090565 and although fully automated, it takes a few extra seconds to connect. The small sub post office at Sneachill is also the area's only village store. Postal collections are made three times each day.
